synopsis.text: Haku, a mysterious boy, warns Chihiro, a young girl, to leave a deserted amusement park before sunset, but her parents, who have transformed into pigs after eating enchanted food, are trapped there. Chihiro finds herself in a world inhabited by spirits and ruled by a greedy witch, Yubaaba. To save her parents and return home, Chihiro must work in Yubaaba's bathhouse and navigate this strange new world. With the help of Haku and newfound friends, Chihiro discovers inner strength and sets out on a journey to break the spell on her parents and find her way back to the human world. Will she succeed in returning home, or will she be trapped in the spirit world forever?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
